__e: Say, my buddies and I, we been wonderin' where you all might be from.
We're bros, and I don't want to ruin the friendship, which is really unlike me.
- No. We don't know what to make of that.
You're not expecting any friends, are you?
By the way, a couple of my mates might be joining us.
but I know I would not be here, when workers come out of there.
Two buddies, we can do whatever we want.
This is for the homeys who ain't here.
Of all your old pals who got locked up or went missing, and you're the only one who got to walk away?
They won't tell anybody because they're your buddies.
How do you know they were buddies?
Seeing as we're being pals, I'll give you a bonus that may come in handy.
I gotta go meet a couple pals at the lodge.
I just sent two of your buddies straight to hell. I don't see why you can't join them.
So I hit the bars with some buddies and we had some cocktails.
